changes.comment: Promote `isPropertyFilterBuilderRuleGroup`, `PropertyFilterBuilderActions`, `PropertyFilterBuilderProps`, `PropertyFilterBuilderRenderer`, `PropertyFilterBuilderRendererProps`, `PropertyFilterBuilderRule`, `PropertyFilterBuilderRuleGroup`, `PropertyFilterBuilderRuleGroupItem`, `PropertyFilterBuilderState`, `usePropertyFilterBuilder`, `UsePropertyFilterBuilderProps` to beta and add `errorMessage` to `PropertyFilterBuilderRule`.
